title: Analyze Wage and Income Transcript
description: A tax professional is preparing a return for a new client and wants to ensure all income sources are included.

tasks.description: Request the client's Wage and Income transcript from the IRS for the tax year.
Review the transcript, which lists all W-2s and 1099s reported to the IRS under the client's SSN.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the official list of income documents.

tasks.description: Compare the transcript data to the documents provided by the client to identify any missing income sources.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent discovers a 1099-G for unemployment income that the client forgot about.
